Check the following:
- Fractional timezones are displayed in the correct columns.
- Left & right navigation across fractional hours shifts the timelines correctly.
- Left & right navigation round-trip equals the starting point.
- Double-midnight for Cuba midnight DST end
- Crossing date boundaries
